translation: A new log with priority {{.prio}} was just submitted by {{.user}}. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
Warning! A new log with priority {{.highest_prio}} was just submitted by {{.user}}. This might require your immediate attention. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
The action {{.action_title}}, regarding incident {{.incident_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}. Click here to view it in ActionChanger.
New publication available! '{{.publication_title}}'. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
{{.contributor}} contributed to your incident {{.incident_name}}. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
The following incident was assigned to you by {{.assigner}}: {{.incident_name}}. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
The following incident has not been updated for two weeks but is still open: {{.incident_name}}. Click here to view it in IncidentChanger.
